meanings.definition: Not relating to or derived from the sun.
meanings.sent1: The underground cave was a nonsolar place, shielded from the sun's rays.
meanings.sent2: The flashlight was a nonsolar source of light, perfect for dark spaces.
meanings.sent3: The vampire's favorite spot was the nonsolar basement, away from any sunlight.
meanings.sent4: In the depths of the forest, they found a nonsolar clearing untouched by sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the nonsolar regions of the ocean, far from the influence of the sun.

meanings.definition: Not using or powered by solar energy.
meanings.sent1: The nonsolar calculator relied on batteries instead of solar panels.
meanings.sent2: Their nonsolar house used traditional electricity, not solar power.
meanings.sent3: The nonsolar car chugged along on gasoline, not sunlight.
meanings.sent4: She preferred nonsolar gadgets that didn't need the sun to function.
meanings.sent5: The nonsolar streetlights lit up the road without any solar energy.
